title: So if bruiser bot is a thing now...
body:
Is teemo adc a proper counter?

Season 2 lethal tempo teemo, 

{{item:3115}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}}  (Sell boots for {{item:3046}} )

Lethal tempo, triumph, legend alacrity, cut down, ravenous hunter, spooky stacks


Damage test, if you wait for LT to proc on like a shroom when you're hiding, it's about 4.35 attacks a second, and about 3k dps


best supports

{{champion:76}} {{item:3504}}  (85% attack speed buff)
{{champion:32}}  with font of life, {{item:3504}} {{item:3001}}  his passive amps teemo damage

{{champion:117}}  (Lulu)

replies.body: Do whatever you want, don't think anyone can really tell you what can and cant be played at this point.
